about_the_game:
Where is grandpa?

Grandpa is still missing and as you delve deeper into the investigation, everything becomes stranger and more enigmatic. Do you dare to unravel all the mysteries?

About the game:

If you are a fan of mystery adventures and point & click puzzle games, you can't miss Beach Cafe III: The Escape Room. In this installment of the saga, the laboratory under the beach bar has given way to intricate caves full of surprising vegetation and unknown minerals.
If that wasn't enough, it seems that some kind of alien form lives in the convoluted labyrinth? Pay attention, because here... every detail counts!

Features

-Explore places full of memories about the stories your grandfather used to tell you.
-Progress through different scenarios using logic. Trust your instinct and make decisions, the resolution of this mystery depends on you.
-Collect memories that will help you solve the puzzles. A wide variety of suspenseful content awaits you.
-Pay attention to your surroundings! This place hides a big secret, but it won't be easy to unravel.

Can you uncover the mystery of the grottoes and escape?

Dare to discover this new installment of the Beach Cafe: The Escape Room saga!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz / AMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, (2 GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon HD 7870, (2 GB VRAM) | Intel HD Graphics 2500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with (4GB VRAM) / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Grandpa is still missing and as you dive deeper into the investigation, everything becomes stranger and more enigmatic. The adventure of puzzles and mysteries continues with Beach Café III: The Escape Room. Investigate, discover all the clues and interpret them properly in order to advance.
